quotes.text: Strength doesn't come from what you can do; it comes from overcoming the things you once thought you couldn't.
quotes.author: Rikki Rogers

quotes.text: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.text: The only bad workout is the one that didn't happen.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Your body can stand almost anything; it's your mind you have to convince.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: The harder the battle, the sweeter the victory.
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.text: Don't count the days; make the days count.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.text: Sweat is just fat crying.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: The only person you should try to be better than is the person you were yesterday.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: It's not about having time; it's about making time.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Believe in yourself, and you will be unstoppable.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Strength grows in the moments when you think you can't go on but keep going anyway.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Success is a journey, not a destination.
quotes.author: Arthur Ashe

quotes.text: The pain you feel today will be the strength you feel tomorrow.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Excuses don't burn calories.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Fitness is not about being better than someone else; it's about being better than you used to be.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: The body achieves what the mind believes.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.text: The difference between a goal and a dream is a deadline.
quotes.author: Steve Smith

quotes.text: Make your vision so clear that your fears become irrelevant.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Winners never quit, and quitters never win.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.text: Every workout is a step closer to your goals.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: You are only limited by your imagination
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Champions aren't built on the days they feel motivated but the days they feel like quitting
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: No carelessness in my action, No confusion in my words, No imprecision in my thoughts.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: There is nothing impossible to him who will try
quotes.author: Alexander the Great

quotes.text: I am not afraid of an army of lions led by a sheep; I am afraid of an army of sheep led by a lion.
quotes.author: Alexander the Great

quotes.text: I would rather live a short life of glory than a long one of obscurity.
quotes.author: Alexander the Great

quotes.text: There is nothing impossible to him who will try.
quotes.author: Alexander the Great

quotes.text: We all love ourselves more than other people, but care more about thier opinion than our own.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.text: It's not what happens to you but how you react to it that matters
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.text: Have patience, all things are difficult before they become easy
quotes.author: Saadi
